description:
Culture is not so easily defined. We think about culture as the mix of ingredients to get a recipe right. How to seek and retain a culturally aligned workforce with Learoy Tonight will provide you with the skills and knowledge to understand what drives culture and what you can do to create and foster the one that's right for you.

If you want to protect your culture, you've got to be able to get the right people to support it. And before that, you need to be able to attract the type of people to want to apply. Your people are your ingredients and your culture is your recipe to bringing them altogether. Get the recipe wrong and it could mean the difference between just needing a pinch of salt, or having an inedible dish.

Figuring out how to get them in and then have them long enough to savour them is a skill you can learn and we're here to show you how.

Each lecture in this course has been carefully selected for you to explore how to implement relevant and meaningful strategies to support you as a leader and culture driver now and in the future.

This course will provide you with many tips and tricks you can utilize inside and out of your workplace, it will encourage and motivate you to really understand and support the environment you're trying to create.

Learoy Tonight is a fresh business with interesting and modern ideas towards education. Many people take part in creating these courses – from subject matter experts, to researchers and designers – to ensure you are provided with the best learning experience and the most up to date information. We are excited about education and want to give you the opportunity to be the best you can be.

This course will take you approximately 30 to 45 minutes to complete and will cover all of the things you need to seek and retain your team. Our content will give you the opportunity to listen to experts and understand relevant models for you to use on your journey to achieving the right people recipe. This will be an experience to enjoy with a collection of videos, interviews and engaging imagery throughout our presentations.

This course is a small section of our Culture: In the Mix journey. If you would like to really challenge yourself, join us for the entire culture building experience.

What are you waiting for? Start tonight, be on your way to amazing culture tomorrow.
title: Culture | How to Seek and Retain a Culturally Aligned Work
